name: Vulto (itch)
description:
Snake Nine is a corrupt organization that is trying to destroy their rival, the ITS Organization. The proof is in a document that should be guarded with heavy security. Eager to stay in business, ITS assigns a special mission for an agent that works with the codename Vulto Ses.

 Vulto, an agent trained to infiltrate any place, must get into the base of Snake Nine, steal the incriminating document and return without being seen. Can Vulto complete that mission undetected?

Link for the soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/user-320144276
